name: Web Kolkata Deals
tag_list: deals, daily-deals, vouchers, coupons, buy-online, kolkata-deals, hot-deals
overview:
Web Kolkata Deals features the best deal vouchers at an unbeatable price on the best stuff to do, see, eat, and buy in Kolkata.

The company intends to penetrate into the inner streets of Kolkata and neighborhood to promote small merchants who have better services at better bargains. While all deals site intend to operate on the Indian level, we thought to cover our home city on the micro level and slowly expand our business to other districts as we grow.

WebKolkataDeals.com helps you to get the money saving services online and our marketing team is working with small business to bring you some outstanding deals that is very near to your door step. You can also gift shopping vouchers to your friends and well wishers.
